Posts.EditableText: I am writing the command ‘put box through window’ I have done all permutations of put place shove etc. Do I have to do all these with thru for US PLAYERS? I don’t code so I do it all longhand.
Posts.HTML: I am writing the command ‘put box through window’ I have done all permutations of put place shove etc. Do I have to do all these with thru for US PLAYERS? I don’t code so I do it all longhand.

Posts.EditableText: No, thru is just shorthand for through.
Posts.HTML: No, thru is just shorthand for through.
